Class MacAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • MacAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.apple.eawt.ApplicationListener, PlugIn, Runnable, EventListener

    public class MacAdapter
extends Object
implements PlugIn, com.apple.eawt.ApplicationListener, Runnable
    This Mac specific plugin handles the "About" and "Quit" items in the Apple menu and opens files dropped on ImageJ and files with creator code "imgJ" that are double-clicked.
